title: Demon Teemo! Teemo NEEDS THIS!
body:
I didnt make this skin but this is so amazing LOL. But he deserves this skin.. its kind of creepy.. watch the video bellow 

http://imgur.com/yS2QaVX


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bpOOu-SGwBY

replies.body: HONESTLY, riot woud make so much money off of this skin
Yeah for real.
not really, i mean not as they could have been doing when the game was actualy fun, now less and less players everyday so less potential to sell skins.
Well he could of gotten that infernal skin, but Diana won it.
At least Diana didn't get a blood moon skin. THAT would be unrealistic.
I feel like they're just waiting to release it as an ultimate skin.
Or they won't make it at all...because it seems to be only for champions from Ionia.
No, {{champion:412}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:60}}
Good point, for some reason I only remember Shen, Akali, and Yasuo. My bad.

The Blood Moon Towerdive Comp.
{{champion:98}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:412}}
They said they don't like making skins that are essentially the same character with no change.
Say that to Definitely Not Blitzcrank {{champion:53}}

*Dear Rito,*

Unfortunately, this will most likely never happen. China didn't allow Graves to have a cigar and got rid of all skeletons. You think they will allow this?
While the concept may not be completely based off Satan if that's the case, there's a good chance Teemo might get a skin related to demons and devils in general since Demon Vi happened.
That's true, but this one is definitely more based of Satan than a demon. I guess it could, just not sure.
Teemo is based on Satan.

They allowed already infernal alistar,demon vi and Aatrox looks pretty demonic as well(not to mention Tahm Kench being an actual demon)

Also China had no problem with graves cigar(the chinese gentleman cho'gath splash had him smoking a cigar),russia and turkey were the problematic countries.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xegt0BTt,comment-id=000e0003,timestamp=2016-09-25T09:49:24.401+0000)
>
> They allowed already infernal alistar,demon vi and Aatrox looks pretty demonic as well(not to mention Tahm Kench being an actual demon)
> 
> Also China had no problem with graves cigar(the chinese gentleman cho'gath splash had him smoking a cigar),russia and turkey were the problematic countries.

Dude, Turkey has pretty high smoking rate already. We dont have anything against cigarettes in video games lol.

Turkey has no problem with smoking until it affects non-smoking people. It only has punishment if you smoke in closed areas. Other then, no.

Nope they did say that turkey was among the countries who had a problem with tobacco.
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4dhzvm/and_thus_riot_reinforced_the_cigar_meme/d1r6r72

Keep in mind that this doesn't mean that turkey is against depicting tobacco in general,just that turkey is a bit more strict with their age rating.

I don't think China would mind a Satan skin, per se. 
Skeletons have a place in Chinese culture, but red devil Satan doesn't appear at all in their culture/history. That has European origins.
Alright, I was fucking wrong, FeelsGoodMan. Not exactly like OP thought, but pretty close.

but teemo is satan

does that mean china will maybe ~~censor~~ disable him in the future?

China is also the reason:
Yorick has Mistwalkers, not Ghouls.
Karthus lost his face.

INB4 Thresh souls become Happy-balls.

Also we will now never get a true Necromancer Champ.
Thanks Tencent.

I have probably posted this many times... But here we go again.

http://i.imgur.com/VaSMYVE.jpg
Wow, that one comes out of a level of hell so deep even the Devil hasn't set food in.

I really like that blinding effect, you can actually see that It'd be impossible to see with that on your head.

The demon eyes explode a lil big though, his mushrooms don't have that large a radius do they?
yep, bigger than u thot right?

the radius is the same, the only problem here is that you cant see the champion that stepped in the mushroom for a brief moment. that does not happen with the other skins (omega squad may be the closest one)
In that video, Teemo looks like a purple Annie. But the skin concept, yes. It's cancer for a cancer champ. Does it justice.

> [{quoted}](name=mvp Light,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xegt0BTt,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-09-24T23:48:55.741+0000)
>
> In that video, Teemo looks like a purple Annie. But the skin concept, yes. It's cancer for a cancer champ. Does it justice.

He says he doesent have teemo model in.. Only Annie one.

Hey, thanks a lot for sharing! :D
The skin is far from done, though. We're working on the animations, now. :)

Hopefully, it'll be ready in just a few weeks!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Now I regret voting for Diana :(
That should be the default skin for teemo
You know, if demons are a thing in Runeterra and yordles just manifest around certain human (likely not limited to human) ideals, a yordle could definitely manifest around demon ideology.
I think the particle effects need to be toned down just a bit so that they are somewhat transparent. As they are now, they are just too distracting and can unintentionally hide other effects.
This is what I want for the next Ultimate skin. It needs to happen! Look Riot, the people have spoken! We really want this to be a thing. :D
They cant release this for obvious religious reason
Infernal Nasus and Demon Vi are things, it would just be Demon/Infernal Teemo
This skin has a pentagram, and almost directly relates to the devil

Pentagrams don't have to do with the devil actually, that's just something promoted by the media. The only religious pentagram that could be seen as remotely evil is the logo for the Church of Satan, although that church's Satan is not the devil, but is using Satan as it's original meaning from Hebrew, meaning adversary. Pentagrams often just have to do with magic or the elements of the earth.

FINALLY, pentagrams alone can obviously not cause religious problems within a game. A character from Dota 2, Doom, has an ultimate which basically draws a pentagram underneath someone to silence their abilities, passives, and items passives and actives.

> [{quoted}](name=invisiblecat1,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xegt0BTt,comment-id=001b,timestamp=2016-09-25T11:14:50.435+0000)
>
> They cant release this for obvious religious reason

As Rintam said there is Demon Vi. If they cant make Demon Teemo at least make it Infernal Teemo. Its same thing.. I guess.
Demon Vi is a skin.
How is this theme different from his basic one? xd
Deemo
yes please
I need this in my Life as much as i hate teemo
What I'm wondering is how did that {{champion:55}}  survive all of those attacks?
It was made in Unity, not league of legends,they were just animations, there was no health.
If it's released, I think it's time for me to bring out my smurf, 666sateemo666
